<a id="ColorPicker"></a>

# ColorPicker

**Inherits:** [VBoxContainer](VBoxContainer.md) **\<** [BoxContainer](BoxContainer.md) **\<** [Container](Container.md) **\<** [Control](Control.md) **\<** [CanvasItem](CanvasItem.md) **\<** [Node](Node.md) **\<** [Object](Object.md)

A widget that provides an interface for selecting or modifying a color.

<!-- classref-introduction-group -->

## Description

A widget that provides an interface for selecting or modifying a color. It can optionally provide functionalities like a color sampler (eyedropper), color modes, and presets.

\ **Note:** This control is the color picker widget itself. You can use a [ColorPickerButton](ColorPickerButton.md) instead if you need a button that brings up a **ColorPicker** in a popup.

<!-- classref-introduction-group -->

## Tutorials

- [Tween Interpolation Demo](https://godotengine.org/asset-library/asset/2733)

## Enumerations

<a id="enum_ColorPicker_ColorModeType"></a>

<!-- classref-enumeration -->

enum **ColorModeType**: [ðŸ”—](#enum_ColorPicker_ColorModeType)

<a id="ColorPicker_constant_MODE_RGB"></a>

<!-- classref-enumeration-constant -->

[ColorModeType](ColorPicker.md#enum_ColorPicker_ColorModeType) **MODE_RGB** = `0`

Allows editing the color with Red/Green/Blue sliders in sRGB color space.<a id="ColorPicker_constant_MODE_HSV"></a>

<!-- classref-enumeration-constant -->

[ColorModeType](ColorPicker.md#enum_ColorPicker_ColorModeType) **MODE_HSV** = `1`

Allows editing the color with Hue/Saturation/Value sliders.<a id="ColorPicker_constant_MODE_RAW"></a>

<!-- classref-enumeration-constant -->

[ColorModeType](ColorPicker.md#enum_ColorPicker_ColorModeType) **MODE_RAW** = `2`

**Deprecated:** This is replaced by [MODE_LINEAR](ColorPicker.md#ColorPicker_constant_MODE_LINEAR).

<a id="ColorPicker_constant_MODE_LINEAR"></a>

<!-- classref-enumeration-constant -->

[ColorModeType](ColorPicker.md#enum_ColorPicker_ColorModeType) **MODE_LINEAR** = `2`

Allows editing the color with Red/Green/Blue sliders in linear color space.<a id="ColorPicker_constant_MODE_OKHSL"></a>

<!-- classref-enumeration-constant -->

[ColorModeType](ColorPicker.md#enum_ColorPicker_ColorModeType) **MODE_OKHSL** = `3`

Allows editing the color with Hue/Saturation/Lightness sliders.

OKHSL is a new color space similar to HSL but that better match perception by leveraging the Oklab color space which is designed to be simple to use, while doing a good job at predicting perceived lightness, chroma and hue.

\ [Okhsv and Okhsl color spaces](https://bottosson.github.io/posts/colorpicker/)<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="enum_ColorPicker_PickerShapeType"></a>

<!-- classref-enumeration -->

enum **PickerShapeType**: [ðŸ”—](#enum_ColorPicker_PickerShapeType)

<a id="ColorPicker_constant_SHAPE_HSV_RECTANGLE"></a>

<!-- classref-enumeration-constant -->

[PickerShapeType](ColorPicker.md#enum_ColorPicker_PickerShapeType) **SHAPE_HSV_RECTANGLE** = `0`

HSV Color Model rectangle color space.<a id="ColorPicker_constant_SHAPE_HSV_WHEEL"></a>

<!-- classref-enumeration-constant -->

[PickerShapeType](ColorPicker.md#enum_ColorPicker_PickerShapeType) **SHAPE_HSV_WHEEL** = `1`

HSV Color Model rectangle color space with a wheel.<a id="ColorPicker_constant_SHAPE_VHS_CIRCLE"></a>

<!-- classref-enumeration-constant -->

[PickerShapeType](ColorPicker.md#enum_ColorPicker_PickerShapeType) **SHAPE_VHS_CIRCLE** = `2`

HSV Color Model circle color space. Use Saturation as a radius.<a id="ColorPicker_constant_SHAPE_OKHSL_CIRCLE"></a>

<!-- classref-enumeration-constant -->

[PickerShapeType](ColorPicker.md#enum_ColorPicker_PickerShapeType) **SHAPE_OKHSL_CIRCLE** = `3`

HSL OK Color Model circle color space.<a id="ColorPicker_constant_SHAPE_NONE"></a>

<!-- classref-enumeration-constant -->

[PickerShapeType](ColorPicker.md#enum_ColorPicker_PickerShapeType) **SHAPE_NONE** = `4`

The color space shape and the shape select button are hidden. Can't be selected from the shapes popup.<a id="ColorPicker_constant_SHAPE_OK_HS_RECTANGLE"></a>

<!-- classref-enumeration-constant -->

[PickerShapeType](ColorPicker.md#enum_ColorPicker_PickerShapeType) **SHAPE_OK_HS_RECTANGLE** = `5`

OKHSL Color Model rectangle with constant lightness.<a id="ColorPicker_constant_SHAPE_OK_HL_RECTANGLE"></a>

<!-- classref-enumeration-constant -->

[PickerShapeType](ColorPicker.md#enum_ColorPicker_PickerShapeType) **SHAPE_OK_HL_RECTANGLE** = `6`

OKHSL Color Model rectangle with constant saturation.<hr class="classref-section-separator"/>

<!-- classref-descriptions-group -->

## Property Descriptions

<a id="ColorPicker_property_can_add_swatches"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

[bool](bool.md) **can_add_swatches** = `true` [ðŸ”—](#ColorPicker_property_can_add_swatches)

<!-- classref-property-setget -->

- `void` **set_can_add_swatches**\ (\ value\: [bool](bool.md)\ )
- [bool](bool.md) **are_swatches_enabled**\ (\ )

If ``true``, it's possible to add presets under Swatches. If ``false``, the button to add presets is disabled.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="ColorPicker_property_color"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

[Color](Color.md) **color** = `Color(1, 1, 1, 1)` [ðŸ”—](#ColorPicker_property_color)

<!-- classref-property-setget -->

- `void` **set_pick_color**\ (\ value\: [Color](Color.md)\ )
- [Color](Color.md) **get_pick_color**\ (\ )

The currently selected color.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="ColorPicker_property_color_mode"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

[ColorModeType](ColorPicker.md#enum_ColorPicker_ColorModeType) **color_mode** = `0` [ðŸ”—](#ColorPicker_property_color_mode)

<!-- classref-property-setget -->

- `void` **set_color_mode**\ (\ value\: [ColorModeType](ColorPicker.md#enum_ColorPicker_ColorModeType)\ )
- [ColorModeType](ColorPicker.md#enum_ColorPicker_ColorModeType) **get_color_mode**\ (\ )

The currently selected color mode.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="ColorPicker_property_color_modes_visible"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

[bool](bool.md) **color_modes_visible** = `true` [ðŸ”—](#ColorPicker_property_color_modes_visible)

<!-- classref-property-setget -->

- `void` **set_modes_visible**\ (\ value\: [bool](bool.md)\ )
- [bool](bool.md) **are_modes_visible**\ (\ )

If ``true``, the color mode buttons are visible.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="ColorPicker_property_deferred_mode"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

[bool](bool.md) **deferred_mode** = `false` [ðŸ”—](#ColorPicker_property_deferred_mode)

<!-- classref-property-setget -->

- `void` **set_deferred_mode**\ (\ value\: [bool](bool.md)\ )
- [bool](bool.md) **is_deferred_mode**\ (\ )

If ``true``, the color will apply only after the user releases the mouse button, otherwise it will apply immediately even in mouse motion event (which can cause performance issues).

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="ColorPicker_property_display_old_color"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

[bool](bool.md) **display_old_color** = `false` [ðŸ”—](#ColorPicker_property_display_old_color)

<!-- classref-property-setget -->

- `void` **set_display_old_color**\ (\ value\: [bool](bool.md)\ )
- [bool](bool.md) **is_displaying_old_color**\ (\ )

If ``true``, [old_color](ColorPicker.md#ColorPicker_property_old_color) will be displayed instead of [color](ColorPicker.md#ColorPicker_property_color).

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="ColorPicker_property_edit_alpha"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

[bool](bool.md) **edit_alpha** = `true` [ðŸ”—](#ColorPicker_property_edit_alpha)

<!-- classref-property-setget -->

- `void` **set_edit_alpha**\ (\ value\: [bool](bool.md)\ )
- [bool](bool.md) **is_editing_alpha**\ (\ )

If ``true``, shows an alpha channel slider (opacity).

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="ColorPicker_property_edit_intensity"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

[bool](bool.md) **edit_intensity** = `true` [ðŸ”—](#ColorPicker_property_edit_intensity)

<!-- classref-property-setget -->

- `void` **set_edit_intensity**\ (\ value\: [bool](bool.md)\ )
- [bool](bool.md) **is_editing_intensity**\ (\ )

If ``true``, shows an intensity slider. The intensity is applied as follows: multiply the color by ``2 ** intensity`` in linear RGB space, and then convert it back to sRGB.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="ColorPicker_property_hex_visible"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

[bool](bool.md) **hex_visible** = `true` [ðŸ”—](#ColorPicker_property_hex_visible)

<!-- classref-property-setget -->

- `void` **set_hex_visible**\ (\ value\: [bool](bool.md)\ )
- [bool](bool.md) **is_hex_visible**\ (\ )

If ``true``, the hex color code input field is visible.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="ColorPicker_property_old_color"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

[Color](Color.md) **old_color** = `Color(0, 0, 0, 1)` [ðŸ”—](#ColorPicker_property_old_color)

<!-- classref-property-setget -->

- `void` **set_old_color**\ (\ value\: [Color](Color.md)\ )
- [Color](Color.md) **get_old_color**\ (\ )

The currently stored old color. See also [display_old_color](ColorPicker.md#ColorPicker_property_display_old_color).

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

- `void` **set_sampler_visible**\ (\ value\: [bool](bool.md)\ )
- [bool](bool.md) **is_sampler_visible**\ (\ )

<!-- classref-property-setget -->

- [bool](bool.md) **are_sliders_visible**\ (\ )

<hr class="classref-section-separator"/>

<!-- classref-descriptions-group -->

## Method Descriptions

<a id="ColorPicker_method_add_preset"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

`void` **add_preset**\ (\ color\: [Color](Color.md)\ ) [ðŸ”—](#ColorPicker_method_add_preset)

Adds the given color to a list of color presets. The presets are displayed in the color picker and the user will be able to select them.

\ **Note:** The presets list is only for *this* color picker.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="ColorPicker_method_add_recent_preset"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

`void` **add_recent_preset**\ (\ color\: [Color](Color.md)\ ) [ðŸ”—](#ColorPicker_method_add_recent_preset)

Adds the given color to a list of color recent presets so that it can be picked later. Recent presets are the colors that were picked recently, a new preset is automatically created and added to recent presets when you pick a new color.

\ **Note:** The recent presets list is only for *this* color picker.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="ColorPicker_method_erase_preset"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

`void` **erase_preset**\ (\ color\: [Color](Color.md)\ ) [ðŸ”—](#ColorPicker_method_erase_preset)

Removes the given color from the list of color presets of this color picker.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="ColorPicker_method_erase_recent_preset"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

`void` **erase_recent_preset**\ (\ color\: [Color](Color.md)\ ) [ðŸ”—](#ColorPicker_method_erase_recent_preset)

Removes the given color from the list of color recent presets of this color picker.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="ColorPicker_method_get_presets"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

[PackedColorArray](PackedColorArray.md) **get_presets**\ (\ ) <span class="const">const</span> [ðŸ”—](#ColorPicker_method_get_presets)

Returns the list of colors in the presets of the color picker.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="ColorPicker_method_get_recent_presets"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

[PackedColorArray](PackedColorArray.md) **get_recent_presets**\ (\ ) <span class="const">const</span> [ðŸ”—](#ColorPicker_method_get_recent_presets)

Returns the list of colors in the recent presets of the color picker.

<hr class="classref-section-separator"/>

<!-- classref-descriptions-group -->

## Theme Property Descriptions

<a id="ColorPicker_theme_color_focused_not_editing_cursor_color"></a>

<!-- classref-themeproperty -->

[Color](Color.md) **focused_not_editing_cursor_color** = `Color(1, 1, 1, 0.275)` [ðŸ”—](#ColorPicker_theme_color_focused_not_editing_cursor_color)

Color of rectangle or circle drawn when a picker shape part is focused but not editable via keyboard or joypad. Displayed *over* the picker shape, so a partially transparent color should be used to ensure the picker shape remains visible.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="ColorPicker_theme_constant_center_slider_grabbers"></a>

<!-- classref-themeproperty -->

[int](int.md) **center_slider_grabbers** = `1` [ðŸ”—](#ColorPicker_theme_constant_center_slider_grabbers)

Overrides the [Slider.center_grabber](Slider.md#Slider_theme_constant_center_grabber) theme property of the sliders.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="ColorPicker_theme_constant_h_width"></a>

<!-- classref-themeproperty -->

[int](int.md) **h_width** = `30` [ðŸ”—](#ColorPicker_theme_constant_h_width)

The width of the hue selection slider.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="ColorPicker_theme_constant_label_width"></a>

<!-- classref-themeproperty -->

[int](int.md) **label_width** = `10` [ðŸ”—](#ColorPicker_theme_constant_label_width)

The minimum width of the color labels next to sliders.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="ColorPicker_theme_constant_margin"></a>

<!-- classref-themeproperty -->

[int](int.md) **margin** = `4` [ðŸ”—](#ColorPicker_theme_constant_margin)

The margin around the **ColorPicker**.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="ColorPicker_theme_constant_sv_height"></a>

<!-- classref-themeproperty -->

[int](int.md) **sv_height** = `256` [ðŸ”—](#ColorPicker_theme_constant_sv_height)

The height of the saturation-value selection box.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="ColorPicker_theme_constant_sv_width"></a>

<!-- classref-themeproperty -->

[int](int.md) **sv_width** = `256` [ðŸ”—](#ColorPicker_theme_constant_sv_width)

The width of the saturation-value selection box.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="ColorPicker_theme_icon_color_script"></a>

The icon for the button that switches color text to hexadecimal.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="ColorPicker_theme_icon_expanded_arrow"></a>

The icon for color preset drop down menu when folded.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="ColorPicker_theme_icon_menu_option"></a>

<!-- classref-themeproperty -->

[Texture2D](Texture2D.md) **menu_option** [ðŸ”—](#ColorPicker_theme_icon_menu_option)

The icon for color preset option menu.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="ColorPicker_theme_icon_overbright_indicator"></a>

<!-- classref-themeproperty -->

[Texture2D](Texture2D.md) **overbright_indicator** [ðŸ”—](#ColorPicker_theme_icon_overbright_indicator)

The indicator used to signalize that the color value is outside the 0-1 range.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="ColorPicker_theme_icon_picker_cursor"></a>

<!-- classref-themeproperty -->

[Texture2D](Texture2D.md) **picker_cursor** [ðŸ”—](#ColorPicker_theme_icon_picker_cursor)

The image displayed over the color box/circle (depending on the [picker_shape](ColorPicker.md#ColorPicker_property_picker_shape)), marking the currently selected color.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="ColorPicker_theme_icon_picker_cursor_bg"></a>

<!-- classref-themeproperty -->

[Texture2D](Texture2D.md) **picker_cursor_bg** [ðŸ”—](#ColorPicker_theme_icon_picker_cursor_bg)

The fill image displayed behind the picker cursor.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="ColorPicker_theme_icon_sample_bg"></a>

<!-- classref-themeproperty -->

[Texture2D](Texture2D.md) **sample_bg** [ðŸ”—](#ColorPicker_theme_icon_sample_bg)

Background panel for the color preview box (visible when the color is translucent).

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="ColorPicker_theme_icon_sample_revert"></a>

<!-- classref-themeproperty -->

[Texture2D](Texture2D.md) **sample_revert** [ðŸ”—](#ColorPicker_theme_icon_sample_revert)

The icon for the revert button (visible on the middle of the "old" color when it differs from the currently selected color). This icon is modulated with a dark color if the "old" color is bright enough, so the icon should be bright to ensure visibility in both scenarios.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="ColorPicker_theme_icon_screen_picker"></a>

<!-- classref-themeproperty -->

[Texture2D](Texture2D.md) **screen_picker** [ðŸ”—](#ColorPicker_theme_icon_screen_picker)

The icon for the screen color picker button.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="ColorPicker_theme_icon_shape_circle"></a>

<!-- classref-themeproperty -->

[Texture2D](Texture2D.md) **shape_circle** [ðŸ”—](#ColorPicker_theme_icon_shape_circle)

The icon for circular picker shapes.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="ColorPicker_theme_icon_shape_rect"></a>

<!-- classref-themeproperty -->

[Texture2D](Texture2D.md) **shape_rect** [ðŸ”—](#ColorPicker_theme_icon_shape_rect)

The icon for rectangular picker shapes.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="ColorPicker_theme_icon_shape_rect_wheel"></a>

<!-- classref-themeproperty -->

[Texture2D](Texture2D.md) **shape_rect_wheel** [ðŸ”—](#ColorPicker_theme_icon_shape_rect_wheel)

The icon for rectangular wheel picker shapes.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="ColorPicker_theme_icon_wheel_picker_cursor"></a>

<!-- classref-themeproperty -->

[Texture2D](Texture2D.md) **wheel_picker_cursor** [ðŸ”—](#ColorPicker_theme_icon_wheel_picker_cursor)

The image displayed over the color wheel (depending on the [picker_shape](ColorPicker.md#ColorPicker_property_picker_shape) being [SHAPE_HSV_WHEEL](ColorPicker.md#ColorPicker_constant_SHAPE_HSV_WHEEL)), marking the currently selected hue. This icon is rotated from the right side of the wheel.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="ColorPicker_theme_style_picker_focus_circle"></a>

<!-- classref-themeproperty -->

[StyleBox](StyleBox.md) **picker_focus_circle** [ðŸ”—](#ColorPicker_theme_style_picker_focus_circle)

The [StyleBox](StyleBox.md) used when the circle-shaped part of the picker is focused. Displayed *over* the picker shape, so a partially transparent [StyleBox](StyleBox.md) should be used to ensure the picker shape remains visible. A [StyleBox](StyleBox.md) that represents an outline or an underline works well for this purpose. To disable the focus visual effect, assign a [StyleBoxEmpty](StyleBoxEmpty.md) resource. Note that disabling the focus visual effect will harm keyboard/controller navigation usability, so this is not recommended for accessibility reasons.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="ColorPicker_theme_style_picker_focus_rectangle"></a>

<!-- classref-themeproperty -->

[StyleBox](StyleBox.md) **picker_focus_rectangle** [ðŸ”—](#ColorPicker_theme_style_picker_focus_rectangle)

The [StyleBox](StyleBox.md) used when the rectangle-shaped part of the picker is focused. Displayed *over* the picker shape, so a partially transparent [StyleBox](StyleBox.md) should be used to ensure the picker shape remains visible. A [StyleBox](StyleBox.md) that represents an outline or an underline works well for this purpose. To disable the focus visual effect, assign a [StyleBoxEmpty](StyleBoxEmpty.md) resource. Note that disabling the focus visual effect will harm keyboard/controller navigation usability, so this is not recommended for accessibility reasons.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="ColorPicker_theme_style_sample_focus"></a>

<!-- classref-themeproperty -->

[StyleBox](StyleBox.md) **sample_focus** [ðŸ”—](#ColorPicker_theme_style_sample_focus)

The [StyleBox](StyleBox.md) used for the old color sample part when it is focused. Displayed *over* the sample, so a partially transparent [StyleBox](StyleBox.md) should be used to ensure the picker shape remains visible. A [StyleBox](StyleBox.md) that represents an outline or an underline works well for this purpose. To disable the focus visual effect, assign a [StyleBoxEmpty](StyleBoxEmpty.md) resource. Note that disabling the focus visual effect will harm keyboard/controller navigation usability, so this is not recommended for accessibility reasons.
